avastAppDesc.message: Nađite najbolje cene, dogovore i kupone prilikom kupovine na mreži uz poređenje cena i proširenje kupona koje omogućava Avast.

avgAppDesc.description: max 132 chars are allowed for this message
avgAppDesc.message: Nađite najbolje cene, dogovore i kupone prilikom kupovine na mreži uz poređenje cena i proširenje kupona koje omogućava AVG.

safePriceContinueShopping.description: It is showed to the user on the rating screen to offer the chance of continue purchasing

safePriceEnjoyQuestion_AVG.description: It is showed to offer the user the chance of rating our shopping extension
safePriceEnjoyQuestion_AVG.message: Uživate u korišćenju usluge AVG SafePrice?

safePriceEnjoyQuestion_Avast.description: It is showed to offer the user the chance of rating our shopping extension
safePriceEnjoyQuestion_Avast.message: Uživate u korišćenju usluge Avast SafePrice?

safePriceLeaveRating.description: It is showed to offer the user the chance of rating our shopping extension
safePriceLeaveRating.message: Ostavite nam ocenu da biste nam pokazali da vam se sviđa.

safeShopBestOfferSaving.description: %s will be the saving percentage of the best offer. Ex: SAVE 25%

safeShopPopularHotelIn.description: %s is the price + currency. Example: Popular hotels from 200,00 €

safeShopSimilarHotel.description: %s is the amount of hotels found. Example: 4 similar hotels

sasAdditionalFees.message: Mogu važiti dodatne naplate i porezi

sasGladYouLike.message: Drago nam je da vam se sviđa!

sasHintBestOfferDesc.message: Idite direktno na najbolju cenu za traženi proizvod.

sasOptionsDisableAll.message: Onemogući SafePrice na svim sajtovima u naredna 24 sata

sasOptionsDisableOnSite.message: Onemogući SafePrice na %s u sledeća 24 sata

sasOptionsEnableAll.description: Message that allow the user to enable SP if it was deactivated for 24H for all domains

sasOptionsEnableOnSite.description: Message that allow the user to enable SP if it was deactivated for 24H for one domain. %s: name of the domain

sasPromoDescription_AVG.message: AVG SafePrice pronalazi najbolje ponude za stvari koje kupujete automatskim upoređivanjem cena na vebu.

sasPromoDescription_Avast.message: Avast SafePrice pronalazi najbolje ponude za stvari koje kupujete automatskim upoređivanjem cena na vebu.

sasRecommendedOfferTitle.message: Ovaj prodavac od poverenja ima dobre cene, ocene i kvalitet usluge.

sasSPTooltipText.message: Videćete najbolje ponude prilikom pretraživanja svojih omiljenih sajtova za kupovinu.

sasSorry.message: Žao nam je što to čujemo

sasStartingPrice.description: %s is the minimum value off the price. Example: Starting at: $124.00

sasWhatToDo.message: Šta možemo da uradimo da bismo se poboljšali?
